details:
verb
- become soft or softer
= example: become soft or softer
- make soft or softer
= example: make soft or softer
- lessen in force or effect
= example: lessen in force or effect
= synonyms: break
- make less severe or harsh
= synonyms: moderate
- protect from impact
= synonyms: buffer
- make (images or sounds) soft or softer
- give in, as to influence or pressure
= synonyms: yield
